# Government Tender Announcement

## Project Title: Jordan Farm Pesticide Building HVAC Project B37
## Tender Reference: cb-262-53875890

### Project Description
The Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada (AAFC) invites bidders to submit proposals for the provision of Heating, Ventilation, and Air Conditioning (HVAC) services for the Jordan Farm Pesticide Building at Jordan Station, L0R 1S0. The project involves the installation of a new HVAC system to ensure year-round temperature control and air quality in the pesticide storage rooms.

### Scope of Work
The scope of work includes, but is not limited to:

* Providing and installing a new fume hood with required accessories and remote mounted exhaust fan on the roof
* Providing and installing a new heat pump unit with outside air for pesticide storage rooms' ventilation requirements
* Installing a temperature and relative humidity control system
* Providing and installing new transfer air grilles for storage rooms and ceiling transfer air grilles for outside air requirements
* All other allied work described in the Invitation to Tender (ITT) documents

### Site Visit
A site visit will be held on January 15, 2024, at 10:00 AM. Interested bidders are required to meet at Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada (AAFC) Jordan Farm, located at 4405 Jordan Road, Jordan Station, L0R 1S0.

### Tender Requirements
* Solicitation Number: 01B46-23-208
* Amendment Number: 4
* Publication Date: January 8, 2024
* Tender Closing Date: January 24, 2024, at 14:00:00
* Expected Contract Start Date: February 1, 2024
* Expected Contract End Date: March 31, 2024

### Contact Information
For more information, please contact Jean-François Lemay at jean-francois.lemay@agr.gc.ca or (514) 768-2672.

### Tender Documents
Tender documents are available on the Canada Buys website at: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/28851/it-01b46-2023-208.pdf. Interested bidders must register to access the documents.
